name: Puttshack Bank
content_summary:

# TEE UP. EAT UP. DRINK UP.

Come for the competition, stay for the world-class dining and high-energy vibes. Our courses do the work for you, with golf balls that track every shot, so you can focus on connecting with friends, family, or that special someone. Whether you’re here to compete or kick back with the crew, we’ve just unlocked your new favorite hangout.

[**THE GAME**\
\
Patented tech so seamless, say goodbye to the hassle and hello to game on.\
\
LEARN MORE](https://puttshack.com/the-game) [**THE FOOD & DRINKS**\
\
Pre game or post game– we’ve got you covered.\
\
LEARN MORE](https://puttshack.com/food-and-drink) [**LET'S PARTY**\
\
There’s no other private event space, happy hour destination, and family pleaser quit...
